browserReleaseNotes.title: Novidades
browserReleaseNotes.note: Page title for the Browser Release Notes page showing what's new in the current release

versionNumber.title: Versão {version}
versionNumber.note: Text that contains the version number for the current release

lastChecked.title: Última verificação: {date}
lastChecked.note: Text that contains the date and time of the last check for version updates

todayAt.title: Hoje à(s) {time}
todayAt.note: Text that marks an event as having happened today at a set time (ex: Today at 7:34pm)

yesterdayAt.title: Ontem à(s) {time}
yesterdayAt.note: Text that marks an event as having happened yesterday at a set time (ex: Yesterday at 7:34pm)

browserUpToDate.title: O DuckDuckGo está atualizado
browserUpToDate.note: Status text for when the browser is already up to date

newVersionAvailable.title: Está disponível uma versão mais recente do navegador
newVersionAvailable.note: Status text for when a new browser version is available

criticallyOutOfDate.title: Atualização crítica necessária
criticallyOutOfDate.note: Status text for when a new browser version is available and the current version is very out of date

checkingForUpdate.title: A verificar atualizações…
checkingForUpdate.note: Status text for when the browser is checking for a newer version

updateError.title: A atualização falhou
updateError.note: Status text for when an error has occurred during the update process

updateDownloading.title: A transferir a atualização {progress}%
updateDownloading.note: Status text for when the browser is downloading a new update. {progress} is a placeholder for a number from 0 to 100 - the word {progress} should not be translated, but it should be placed in the appropriate position within the text. The percentage sign should also be placed correctly according to the locale (example: Downloading Update 74%)

updatePreparing.title: A preparar a atualização
updatePreparing.note: Status text for when the browser has finished downloading the update but is still installing it

restartToUpdate.title: Reiniciar para atualizar
restartToUpdate.note: Label for a button that triggers a browser restart after a version update

updateBrowser.title: Atualizar o DuckDuckGo
updateBrowser.note: Label for a button that triggers a manual browser update

retryUpdate.title: Repetir atualização
retryUpdate.note: Label for a button that retries applying the failed update

forPrivacyProSubscribers.title: Para subscritores do Privacy Pro
forPrivacyProSubscribers.note: Heading label for release notes specific to Privacy Pro Subscribers (do not translate Privacy Pro)

new.title: Novo
new.note: Text for tag that appears next to version number to indicate it is newly released

somethingWentWrong.title: Ocorreu um erro
somethingWentWrong.note: A message shown when the application experienced a crash
